  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddAppointmentController
    This class controls the screen for adding Appointments using the GUI
    AddCustomerController
    This class is the controller for adding customers with the GUI
    Appointment  
    AppointmentDAO
    This class makes queries to the database This class handles all of the CRUD operations for Appointments with the database
    AppointmentsByCustomerController
    This class makes a report of number the appointments by Customer by Type and by Month Use the radio buttons to select Type or Month.
    AppointmentsMainController
    This class is for the main screen for Appointments
    Contact
    This class if for Contacts
    ContactDAO
    Class for making queries to database for Contacts
    Country
    This is the Country class
    CountryDAO
    this class performs all queries to the database for Countries
    Customer
    This is the class for Customers
    CustomerDAO
    This class makes queries to the database This class handles all of the CRUD operations for Customers with the database
    CustomersMainController
    This class is for the main screen for Customers
    CustomerStatisticsController
    This class makes a report of the number of appointments for customers and the average appointment duration
    dbconnection
    This class establishes a connection to the database
    FirstLevelDivision
    This class is for FirstLevelDivisions
    FirstLevelDivisionDAO
    this class is for FirstLevelDivisions
    LoginController
    Class to control the login screen User inputs username and password, and those are verified against the database
    Main
    This class is used to launch the application
    MainController
    Class for controlling main menu screen
    Query
    This class creates statements and prepared statements for queries to the database
    ReportsMainController
    Class for controlling the reports main menu
    ResourceBundles
    Class for Resource Bundles
    ScheduleContactController
    this class controls the report for contact schedules
